verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him out of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H120>them,<s%> 'When anyone of you <S%H7126>offers<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> your <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H929>livestock,<s%> from the <S%H1241>herd<s%> and from the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

<S%H7133><s%>"'If his offering is a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> from the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish.<s%> He <S%H7522>shall<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> it at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> that he may be accepted <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
He shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and it shall be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for him to make atonement for <S%H3722>him.<s%>

He shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H1121>bull<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> shall <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that is at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>
He shall <S%H6584>flay<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H5408>cut<s%> it into <S%H5409>pieces.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and lay <S%H6086>wood<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> on the <S%H784>fire;<s%>

and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> shall <S%H6186>lay<s%> the <S%H7218>pieces,<s%> the head, and the <S%H6309>fat<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> on the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire<s%> which is on the <S%H4196>altar;<s%>

but its <S%H7130>innards<s%> and its <S%H3767>legs<s%> he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the whole on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7133><s%>"'If his offering is from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> from the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> or from the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>

He shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> it on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He shall <S%H5408>cut<s%> it into its <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> with its <S%H7218>head<s%> and its <S%H6309>fat.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall lay them in <S%H6186>order<s%> on the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire<s%> which is on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%>

but the <S%H7130>innards<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs<s%> he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H6999>whole,<s%> and burn it on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> It is a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H5930><s%>"'If his offering to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of <S%H5775>birds,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> or of <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> it to the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and wring <S%H4454>off<s%> its <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and its <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be drained <S%H4680>out<s%> on the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar;<s%>

and he shall take <S%H5493>away<s%> its <S%H4760>crop<s%> with its <S%H5133>filth,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the east <S%H6924>part,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H1880>ashes.<s%>

He shall <S%H8156>tear<s%> it by its <S%H3671>wings,<s%> but shall not divide it <S%H914>apart.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> on the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire.<s%> It is a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
